name: Winning Portfolio
author: Pressfore

sections.description:
Winning Portfolio is Best Responsive Portfolio for creating stunning portfolios that can be displayed in the number of columns of your choosing. Simple, yet clean and modern look will enchance your website while you manage to display your creative portfolio to potential client, and business partners.

Portfolio Demo | Documentation

Masonry Addon Demo | Additions Addon

Main Features:

  • Responsive
  • Clean and modern look
  • Easy to use
  • Simple To Customize
  • Simple integration via Shortcode
  • Visual Compsoer Support
  • King Composer Support

Want to see some new feature ? Propose us a feature Here . We are looking forward to hear from you!
sections.installation:
Winning Portfolio can be installed in two different ways:

  • Via WordpPress uploader
  • or via FTP Client

1- Steps to follow to install plugin via WordPress uploader

  • go to WordPress admin panel and click on “plugins” from the dashboard menu.
  • Then from Plugins -> Add New -> Upload -> Choose file -> and then choose winning-portfolio.zip and press Open-> Install Now -> Activate Plugin

2- Steps to follow to install plugin via FTP

  • Unzip the file
  • Upload unziped winning-portfolio folder to your WordPress plugins directory (/wp-content/plugins/)
  • Activate from WordPress menu Plugins section

short_description: Best free grid portfolio plugin for creating stunning and clean, modern looking portfolio list. Showcase your achievements with great simplicity.
